Contact.title: Contact Us
Contact.content: Get in touch with our team today.

Reviews.title: Customer Reviews
Reviews.subtitle: We're committed to excellence
Reviews.content: See what our customers say about us.
Reviews.ctaDescription: Join our growing list of satisfied customers today.

reviews.text: Max and the team did an incredible job on my 2020 Mazda CX-30. I'm extremely happy with the results and would recommend them to everyone!
reviews.author: Jarrett B.

reviews.text: The owner Max was AMAZING!! His work is top notch! I think my vehicle actually looks better than it did before I had the accident!
reviews.author: Jordan P.

reviews.text: Had a door out of alignment and Max fixed it in just a few minutes. No appointment. Just rolled in off the street. Great place.
reviews.author: Rob G.

Services.expertiseTitle: Why Expert Auto Body Repair Matters
Services.expertiseDescription: Modern vehicles are complex machines requiring specialized knowledge and equipment for proper repairs. Choosing the right auto body shop can make all the difference in your vehicle's safety and longevity.

expertiseCards.title: Safety First
expertiseCards.description: Proper repairs ensure your vehicle's structural integrity and safety systems function correctly, protecting you and your passengers.

expertiseCards.title: Advanced Technology
expertiseCards.description: We use state-of-the-art equipment and techniques to diagnose and repair modern vehicles with precision and accuracy.

expertiseCards.title: Long-Term Value
expertiseCards.description: Expert repairs maintain your vehicle's value and prevent future problems, saving you money in the long run.

Services.ctaTitle: Ready to Get Your Car Back to Perfect?
Services.ctaDescription: Schedule your appointment today and experience the difference expert auto body repair makes.
